At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose target permanent you control. If it’s not a creature, it becomes a 0/0 artifact creature in addition to its other types. Then it gets +4/+4 and gains vigilance and haste until end of turn.
Retrofit {1}{G} [i](You may cast this from the battlefield for its retrofit cost. It’s a 4/4 artifact creature and loses retrofit.)[/i]
